about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • M18 "Black Cat" (Rank 3 USA);
  • Premium account for 15 days.

M18 Hellcats of the 805th Tank Destroyer Battalion (which operated in Italy) were some of the most colourful, with a black panther crushing a tank with its jaws emblem. The naming practice was to start the vehicle’s name with the company letter. Thus the first vehicle of company B was named “Black Cat”. The M18 had very light armouring, but was the fastest armoured vehicle of WWII with a top speed of 45 mph. Thanks to this, it excelled at flank attacks and was the most effective US tank destroyer of WWII.

  • All premium vehicles allow you to earn increased Research Points and Silver Lions for each battle and comes furnished with all available modifications.
  • With a Premium account (also purchasable in the game for Golden Eagles) you will earn more Research Points and Silver Lions during each battle for a set amount of days. This is cumulative with bonuses from premium vehicles!

Note!

  • To add this DLC to your account, launch the War Thunder client from Steam library and press the Steam Login button at the startup screen in the game.
  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!
  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
This Pack includes:

  • M18 "Black Cat" (Rank 3 USA);
  • Premium account for 15 days.

M18 Hellcats of the 805th Tank Destroyer Battalion (which operated in Italy) were some of the most colourful, with a black panther crushing a tank with its jaws emblem. The naming practice was to start the vehicle’s name with the company letter. Thus the first vehicle of company B was named “Black Cat”. The M18 had very light armouring, but was the fastest armoured vehicle of WWII with a top speed of 45 mph. Thanks to this, it excelled at flank attacks and was the most effective US tank destroyer of WWII.

  • All premium vehicles allow you to earn increased Research Points and Silver Lions for each battle and comes furnished with all available modifications.
  • With a Premium account (also purchasable in the game for Golden Eagles) you will earn more Research Points and Silver Lions during each battle for a set amount of days. This is cumulative with bonuses from premium vehicles!

Note!

  • To add this DLC to your account, launch the War Thunder client from Steam library and press the Steam Login button at the startup screen in the game.
  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!
  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions, SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 660 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months; the minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p)
  • Hard Drive: 8.6 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64bit, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 960 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months)
  • Hard Drive: 22.6 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4000 HD/Radeon HD5550/GeForce 8800 (The minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p)
  • Hard Drive: 8.61 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 680M or higher
  • Hard Drive: 22.65 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or higher, AMD R9 280 or higher (DirectX 11 level video card and drivers)
  • Hard Drive: 21 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
